content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
─────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Facility at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)

Use-case: Produces additional iron plates via smelting to support the crafting of Lab subcomponents.

### Copper Plate Production Facility at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of the following entity:
- Copper Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)

Use-case: Converts copper ore into copper plates needed as inputs for copper cable production, which in turn is required for Lab crafting.

ERROR TIPS
──────────
- Incorrect API call to get_entities:
  • Avoid using unsupported keyword arguments (such as 'radius'); follow the defined API signature.
  • Ensure the correct number of positional arguments is used.
- Handling of get_entities return values:
  • Verify that the returned value is iterable (fallback to an empty list if None) before attempting any iteration.
- Lab placement issues:
  • Confirm that a Lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
- Lab crafting failures due to missing ingredients:
  • Ensure all sub-ingredients (e.g., iron-gear-wheels, copper-cables, electronic circuits) are available by verifying resource counts and completing necessary smelting operations prior to crafting.
